column4: quick, what is the line I want to use with aptitude to upgrade dapper -> edgy? So that I can leave it to upgrade and go shave? :)
ah yes. i'm one of the GNOME sysamdins. :)
when you're done with that short term memory part of your brain, could i lease it or something. ;)
I doubt it'll be useful, leaky as shit ;)
mine not only leaks, but is FIFO and cooperatively multitasks. :/
so, before we trade our short-term memories, do you happen to know a line to insert into sources.list / whatever for upgrading to Edgy?
lemme find the correct URLs for you.
i know we have it documented somewhere internally, just need to find it.
yeah, I know it's possible, I just don't feel like fighting with releases and pins today :)
WHOA, "Upgrade distribution" button sure is shiny. A bit like star trek :)
Please state the nature of the dist-upgrade emergency. ;)
